display_long_description:
**Get your stacking skills ready with Make It Stable!** 

In Make It Stable your mission is simple yet exhilarating: balance the tallest tower using a variety of objects. Just try not to get too distracted by those adorable giggles and expressive eyes staring at you from the heights!
With over 100 different objects, each with its own personality, and different mechanic-based worlds, Make It Stable makes each moment a unique challenge full of fun.

[media]

🧩**Build and  Balence Towers**

- 40 levels across 4 worlds with different materials and mechanics to stack!

- No time limits, no pressure—play at your own pace and take as many attempts as you need to build the tallest tower.


🧨**Cool Mechanics and Engaging Objects**

- Interact with realistic physics and dynamic elements that create a unique experience in every game.

- Delight in stacking playful, reactive items, all with the cutest expressions!

**🥇Compete on the Daily Challenges!**

- Compete with players worldwide to stack the highest tower!

- Discover fresh items and tasks that vary every day.

**🎲Access the Challenge Mode** 

- Feeling adventurous? Roll the dice in the main menu to revisit previous Daily Challenges and test your skills with a random twist.

- Every game promises to test your patience and creativity with endless fun.

**How high can you go?** Find out and push your limits!
